list.name: CARDBOARD-BOX
list.description: Hide in a cardboard box becoming invisible for x seconds. Charges the Super x faster while stationary.
list.descriptionHtml: Hide in a cardboard box becoming invisible for x seconds. Charges the Super x faster while stationary.

list.name: CHEESEBURGER
list.description: Heals himself and the friendly Brawler he is attached to for x.
list.descriptionHtml: Heals himself and the friendly Brawler he is attached to for x.
